title: "No context to run" exception thrown every time HonoClient is instantiated
body:
Quite recently we migrated to Hono 0.7-M2 and are observing the following exception, every time when the HonoClient is retrieved/instantiated in the Http Protocol Adatper (~ every 10 Minutes)

But the overall system is working (telemetry and event), I suppose due to retries. So the below exception is not blocking but interested to know if something is wrong.
